issuer.name: Northeastern University (NU)
issuer.description: Founded in 1898, we’re renowned for our experiential learning model, high-impact research, deep partnerships, and worldwide reach. From day one we’ve pursued innovative ways of teaching and research that place a premium on experience and engagement with the world. Today, our signature approach erases traditional boundaries, empowering not only students, but faculty, alumni, partners, and innovators to solve problems and pursue impact.

name: Foundations of Software Engineering and Data Management Learning
description: Earners of this badge completed a six-week course introducing the primary functions of programming, software development, and data management in engineering. Designed for students from diverse backgrounds, the course covered basic python programming, software development lifecycles, big data, data management strategies, and data visualization. Badge earners engaged with readings, videos, and weekly quizzes to gain a foundation in data management and software development in engineering, preparing themselves for careers in various industries.

criteria.narrative:
- Complete the 6-week, online-asynchronous, non-credit course, _Foundations of Software Engineering and Data Management Learning_.
- View all course materials.
- Complete all weekly quizzes.

achievement.description: Earners of this badge completed a six-week course introducing the primary functions of programming, software development, and data management in engineering. Designed for students from diverse backgrounds, the course covered basic python programming, software development lifecycles, big data, data management strategies, and data visualization. Badge earners engaged with readings, videos, and weekly quizzes to gain a foundation in data management and software development in engineering, preparing themselves for careers in various industries.
